original_title: This* Is What Queer Looks Like
overview: Mian Carvin surveyed the queer community of Olympia, WA, for her short “This* Is What Queer Looks Like.” Its message is pretty simple—heck, it’s right there in the title—but even capital-G Gays sometimes need a reminder that LGBTs come in a variety of colors, styles, colors, ages and identities.
title: This* Is What Queer Looks Like
